text: Ottorino Sartor (September 18, 1945 - June 2, 2021) was a Peruvian football goalkeeper. He played his club football for Colegio Nacional de Iquitos. He competed for the Peru national football team at the 1978 FIFA World Cup. He played for the team from 1966 until 1979, making 27 appearances. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Peruvian footballers
title: Ottorino Sartor
